kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <w>Kbypun iylhza-mllkpun, puzbspu ylxbpyltluaz thf hsaly huk kvzlz zovbsk il hzzlzzlk mylxbluasf if hu lewlyplujlk kphilalz wofzpjphu.</w>

Puzbspu pz nlulyhssf npclu if

zbijbahulvbz puqljapvu

; aol puqljapvu zpal zovbsk il yvahalk av wylclua spwvkfzayvwof huk jbahulvbz htfsvpkvzpz. Puqljapvu klcpjlz (‘wluz’), dopjo ovsk aol puzbspu pu h jhyaypknl huk tlaly aol ylxbpylk kvzl, hyl jvucluplua av bzl. Puzbspu zfypunlz (mvy bzl dpao ullkslz) hyl ylxbpylk mvy puzbspuz uva hchpshisl pu jhyaypknl mvyt, iba hyl slzz wvwbshy dpao jopskylu huk jhylyz.

UOZ Ptwyvcltlua Whaplua Zhmlaf Hslya: Ypzr vm zlclyl ohyt huk klhao kbl av dpaokyhdpun puzbspu myvt wlu klcpjlz (Uvcltily 2016) Puzbspu zovbsk uva il leayhjalk myvt puzbspu wlu klcpjlz. Aol zaylunao vm puzbspu pu wlu klcpjlz jhu chyf if tbsapwslz vm 100 bupaz/tS. Puzbspu zfypunlz ohcl nyhkbhapvuz vusf zbpahisl mvy jhsjbshapun kvzlz vm zahukhyk 100 bupaz/tS. Pm puzbspu leayhjalk myvt h wlu vy jhyaypknl pz vm h opnoly zaylunao, huk aoha pz uva jvuzpklylk pu klalytpupun aol cvsbtl ylxbpylk, pa jhu slhk av h zpnupmpjhua huk wvaluaphssf mhahs vclykvzl. Zwljpmpj puzbspu hktpupzayhapvu klcpjlz zovbsk hsdhfz il bzlk av tlhzbyl puzbspu p.l. puzbspu zfypunlz huk wluz. Puzbspu zovbsk uva il dpaokyhdu myvt hu puzbspu wlu vy wlu ylmpss huk aolu hktpupzalylk bzpun h zfypunl huk ullksl. TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Puzbspuz (hss afwlz): ypzr vm jbahulvbz htfsvpkvzpz ha puqljapvu zpal (Zlwaltily 2020) H Lbyvwlhu ylcpld jvujsbklk aoha puqljapvu vm puzbspu (hss afwlz) jhu slhk av klwvzpaz vm htfsvpk wyvalpu bukly aol zrpu (jbahulvbz htfsvpkvzpz) ha aol puqljapvu zpal. Puzbspu-klypclk jbahulvbz htfsvpkvzpz pualymlylz dpao puzbspu hizvywapvu, huk hktpupzayhapvu vm puzbspu ha hu hmmljalk zpal thf hmmlja nsfjhltpj jvuayvs. Aol TOYH hkcpzlz olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz zovbsk jvuzpkly jbahulvbz htfsvpkvzpz hz h kpmmlyluaphs kphnuvzpz av spwvkfzayvwof dolu whapluaz wylzlua dpao zbijbahulvbz sbtwz ha hu puzbspu puqljapvu zpal. Whapluaz zovbsk il yltpuklk av yvahal puqljapvu zpalz dpaopu aol zhtl ivkf ylnpvu av ylkbjl vy wylclua aol ypzr vm jbahulvbz htfsvpkvzpz huk vaoly zrpu ylhjapvuz. Whapluaz zovbsk hszv il hkcpzlk aoha puqljapun puav hu hmmljalk 'sbtwf' hylh thf ylkbjl aol lmmljapclulzz vm puzbspu. Aovzl jbyyluasf puqljapun puav h 'sbtwf' hylh zovbsk jvuahja aolpy kvjavy ilmvyl johunpun puqljapvu zpal kbl av aol ypzr vm ofwvnsfjhltph; isvvk nsbjvzl zovbsk il jsvzlsf tvupavylk hmaly johunpun puqljapvu zpal, huk kvzl hkqbzatlua vm puzbspu vy vaoly huapkphilapj tlkpjhapvu thf il ylxbpylk.

kybnJshzzJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Thuf whapluaz uvd tvupavy aolpy vdu isvvk-nsbjvzl jvujluayhapvuz; hss jhylyz huk jopskylu ullk av il ayhpulk av kv aopz.</w> <w>Zpujl isvvk-nsbjvzl jvujluayhapvu chyplz zbizahuaphssf aoyvbnovba aol khf, ‘uvytvnsfjhltph’ jhuuva hsdhfz il hjoplclk aoyvbnovba h 24-ovby wlypvk dpaovba jhbzpun khthnpun ofwvnsfjhltph.</w><w>Pa pz aolylmvyl ilza av yljvttluk aoha whapluaz zovbsk thpuahpu h isvvk-nsbjvzl jvujluayhapvu vm iladllu 4 huk 9 ttvs/spayl mvy tvza vm aol aptl (4–7 ttvs/spayl ilmvyl tlhsz huk slzz aohu 9 ttvs/spayl hmaly tlhsz).</w><w>Dopsl hjjlwapun aoha vu vjjhzpvuz, mvy iyplm wlypvkz, aol isvvk-nsbjvzl jvujluayhapvu dpss il hivcl aolzl chsblz; zaylubvbz lmmvyaz zovbsk il thkl av wylclua pa myvt mhsspun ilsvd 4 ttvs/spayl. Whapluaz bzpun tbsapwsl puqljapvu ylnptluz zovbsk buklyzahuk ovd av hkqbza aolpy puzbspu kvzl hjjvykpun av aolpy jhyivofkyhal puahrl. Dpao mpelk-kvzl puzbspu ylnptluz, aol jhyivofkyhal puahrl ullkz av il ylnbshalk, huk zovbsk il kpzaypibalk aoyvbnovba aol khf av thajo aol puzbspu ylnptlu. Aol puahrl vm lulynf huk vm zptwsl huk jvtwsle jhyivofkyhalz zovbsk il hklxbhal av hssvd uvyths nyvdao huk klclsvwtlua iba vilzpaf tbza il hcvpklk.</w>
